lenders.name: Devin & Anabel
lenders.loan_because: My wife and I do a project called The Insignificant Project and we see the importance and impact of small dedicated efforts to helping others. I see Kiva as an amazing opportunity to help people create business opportunities that will have long term impact.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a freelance photographer and i shoot primarily music artists, Anabel is a make up artist.  We live in Los Angeles and Paris.

lenders.name: maggie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others be successful in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Language Arts teacher which means I teach both Reading and English. I work with 7th graders.

lenders.name: Carlos

I am grateful for living in a capitalistic economy; and I feel like all should experience the benefits of capitalism, not the harshness.  Kiva allows others to enjoy the nice things of capitalism, which is why I greatly admire the organization.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for one of the worlds largest defense contractors performing IT support for their space and business units.

lenders.name: Honsell & Shizuko
lenders.loan_because: We just want to help someone in some small way.
lenders.occupational_info: My wife and I are in our mid 60s and retired.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: Good for the soul
lenders.occupational_info: Bring Boring Things to Life

lenders.name: Damon
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others succeed in life and I feel that I can make the greatest impact by lending directly to those in need.  I hope that I can make a difference by investing in the success of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the medical field and I am currently applying to MBA programs that have an emphasis in health care management.  I hope to one day work for a pharmaceutical or biotech company that values social responsibility as well as profitability.

lenders.name: K.C.
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.occupational_info: I run a small company that installs and fixes computers for small businesses

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I became ill and unable to work; I had/have a long road to getting better and currently putting myself back into school to a career that my current condition will allow. I have very little money and actually loaned via credit card, but when I heard of this organization and given what I have had to face over the past years I have come to a realization that money is nothing. Without your health and the ones you love by your side life is meaningless. Knowing that what little I can give is going to help a family somewhere in the world that needs it is worth any amount of monetary interest.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a network engineer until I became disabled. I am currently going back to school to become a teacher which will be less demanding on my health but more importantly I am studying my passion which is physics. I hope that in teaching I can inspire the next generation to learn and make better the world in which we live in through science.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: giving is living

lenders.name: Martha

lenders.name: Karin

lenders.name: michael

I shall divide my gifts from thee, with every brother that I see who has the need of help from me. Because I have been blessed by thy great love, dear Lord. I'll share thy love again, according to Thy word. I shall give love to those in need; I'll show that love by word and deed: Thus shall my thanks be thanks in deed.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide support for computers and other technology resources in the veterinary medical field.

lenders.name: Imaginary Alpacas
lenders.loan_because: I can help others help themselves through Kiva while teaching my daughter to share her good fortune. I truly admire these wonderful people who are able to make their small businesses work and support their families. We can all learn a lot from them.
lenders.occupational_info: I care for my family. I help keep my alpacas healthy and spin their wool into yarn. Then I knit or weave it into products I hope to sell to support my family. Alpacas are the stress relief in my life. We are hopeful to be as successful as these entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Márcia
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference! :-)
lenders.occupational_info: I perform software testing for different kind of apps (desktop, web, financial...)

lenders.name: Kirby
lenders.loan_because: It is a simple and powerful way to promote the entrepreneurial spirit and make lives better around the world.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: Imagine helping a small business or family in need for about the cost of a dinner at Red Lobster.  I am trying to expand my business and so I am hoping this will send me some good Karma.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a small 12 room roadside inn.  The rooms are small but very comfortable.   It is very hard work and I don't make a lot of money but it is fun.  I am a single father to a 15 year old boy I adopted from Russia when he was five years old.

Love You All,
Tanya

lenders.name: Beauty Schools Directory

lenders.occupational_info: I work in public health at the medical school in Oregon, USA.  And, with my friends in the photo (I am on the right) we paint together and turn our art into products we sell to our community to raise funds to share with others.

I have served over 500 hours with the American Red Cross, and sponsor 2 children in Honduras through the Christian Childrens' Fund.  I enjoy helping people.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to be an on-site computer instructor.  I drove to people's homes & businesses and taught them how to use new hardware, software, and internet applications.

lenders.occupational_info: I make films.

lenders.name: Michael

lenders.occupational_info: I'm a corrections officer in a jail that houses around 100 inmates year round. The jail is in a community with a population of 50,000. We see a wide variety of offenders from simple larceny charges to murder.

lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with a good life and there are those who need help.  I hope they are all successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I now help school systems with their classroom technology and play guitar with a bluegrass band.

lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.loan_because: I hope to help and improve the human condition. I also enjoy helping those who help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: A filmmaker who believes in a better tomorrow and would like to replace fear with hope.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people make their dreams come true, if I can, even if it's just in a small way.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: It is a simple and inexpensive way for individuals to act collectively and make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am employed by BT, a UK based provider of telecommunications services.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: It's a good thing for the world. I feel, as someone as fortunate as I, it is a duty to donate and loan to the less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I program for the Nintendo DS and Wii;

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because:
This was a Christmas gift from my sister in lieu of a tradtional gift exchange.  I'm thrilled to be able to put my gift to good use and look forward to an ongoing relationship with KIVA.  

I was recently on a trip to Cambodia and was captured by the warm spirit and friendliness of the people there - seeing how hard everyone worked day in and day out was a life changing experience for me.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a large architecture firm in Minneapolis, MN where I help design, coordinate and manage construction projects for large corporations.

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.loan_because: I believe everybody deserves a chance for a good life.  I am happy to help.

lenders.name: Brenna
lenders.loan_because: I know how lucky I am to have been born in the United States and to have a good job. Loaning is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage payments to my company, and make sure our bills are paid. I also approve new vendors.

lenders.name: Eileen
lenders.loan_because: Whenever I start to feel depressed, or I think that life is hard, I go to Kiva to gain perspective.  You can make such a difference in someone else's life with so little investment - it's very uplifting.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: Stewardship of what God provides mandates that His allowances to one be shared for the benefit for all of His children
lenders.occupational_info: Consulting with Retail Merchants to improve their business

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: Such a small amount really can make a difference in numbers !

lenders.occupational_info: I have experience in printing, automotive, and currently working in aerospace.  I'm an innovator and thrive on developing new electromechanical systems for aircraft's.

lenders.name: Aerin
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed. I live in an incredible location, have an amazing family, and I am able to seek education and other aspirations without thinking twice.  I know that life isn't this easy everywhere, and if all it takes is a little bit of help to get someone on their feet, then it is my responsibility to help. I prefer a "hand up" approach to charity as opposed to a "hand out" approach, and Kiva  exemplifies my philosophy on giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school to learn about the environment and ways that we can improve and help the world to ensure that it will stay beautiful for  future generations.  In order to pay for my schooling, I work at a law firm which specializes in lender liability, meaning that we hold big banks and other corporations accountable when they try to cheat their customers.

lenders.loan_because: I desire to help hardworking  people accross the world who need to support themselves and their families.  I want to show Jesus Christ's love to those who perhaps wouldn't have a chance otherwise.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm just finishing high school and will be entering college--probably a Bible college or to get my teaching credential.

lenders.occupational_info: My job is to assist those in my department which I like doing.  The bonus is that I work in sports which adds to the fun of the day.

lenders.loan_because:
I know how tough it is to start a business without help in the U.S., and I can believe it is even more difficult in other parts of the world.  

Some great people believed in me and helped me on my way, so I now want to pass that help on to someone else in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I own two small businesses.  One is a pizza & sub shop, the other is a rental business servicing college students.  I am also currently serving on active duty with the U.S. Army in Michigan.
